text: What object in the bedroom can people easily use to cover the window to prevent the penetration of sunlight?
To block out sunlight and prevent it from penetrating a bedroom, which object can be utilized to easily cover the window?
What item can be easily utilized in the bedroom to cover the window and block sunlight from entering?
What is the object located in the bedroom that people can use to block sunlight from entering through the window?
What object, present in a bedroom, would be a convenient option for preventing sunlight from entering the room when needed?
What object in the bedroom can be conveniently used to block sunlight from entering through the window?
